welcome.title: Welcome to Lorent Bloom!
welcome.description: Let's get your account set up so you can start renting out. Complete these quick steps:
welcome.step1: Add your personal identification number (IDNP) in account settings
welcome.step2: List your first product for rent

banner.title: Complete your profile
banner.subtitle: {completed} of {total} steps done
banner.congratulations: You're all set! Your account is fully configured.

idnp.title: Add your IDNP
idnp.description: Required to list products and process rentals

product.title: List your first product
product.description: Start earning by adding a product for rent

guideSelection.title: Choose a Guide
guideSelection.description: Select a step-by-step guide to learn how the platform works

accountOverview.title: Account Overview
accountOverview.description: Learn about all sections of your account and what each one does

profileSetup.title: Profile Setup
profileSetup.description: Fill in your personal information, phone and IDNP

howToRentOut.title: How to Rent Out
howToRentOut.description: Learn how to list your products for rent step by step

howToRent.title: How to Rent
howToRent.description: Learn how to find and rent products from others

myProducts.title: My Products
myProducts.description: Here you manage all products you've listed for rent. Add new products, edit existing ones, or disable listings.

myRents.title: My Rents
myRents.description: Track orders you've placed as a renter. View order details, status, and rental history.

myProductRentals.title: My Product Rentals
myProductRentals.description: See who is renting your products. Manage incoming rental requests and track active rentals.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Sign rental contracts and manage all your rental documents. Check for pending signatures.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: Manage your billing and shipping addresses for smooth checkout and deliveries.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Update your personal info: name, phone, IDNP, email, and password.

firstname.title: First Name
firstname.description: Enter your first name. This will be visible to other users.

lastname.title: Last Name
lastname.description: Enter your last name. Used for contracts and identification.

phone.title: Phone Number
phone.description: Add your Moldovan phone number (+373). Used for contact about rentals.

idnp.title: IDNP (Personal Number)
idnp.description: Your 13-digit personal identification number. Required to list products for rent.

save.title: Save Changes
save.description: Don't forget to save after filling in your information!

goToSettings.title: Step 1: Go to Settings
goToSettings.description: First, click here to go to your account settings and fill in your IDNP.

fillIdnp.title: Step 2: Fill in IDNP
fillIdnp.description: Enter your 13-digit personal identification number. This is required to list products.

saveSettings.title: Step 3: Save
saveSettings.description: Click Save to store your IDNP.

goToProducts.title: Step 4: Go to My Products
goToProducts.description: Now click here to go to your products page.

addProduct.title: Step 5: Add Product
addProduct.description: Click this button to add your first product.

formName.title: Step 6: Product Name
formName.description: Enter the name of your product. Make it clear and descriptive so renters can find it easily.

formCategory.title: Step 7: Category
formCategory.description: Select a category for your product. This helps renters find your product when browsing.

formImages.title: Step 8: Upload Photos
formImages.description: Upload clear photos of your product. Good photos increase rental interest.

formPrice.title: Step 9: Set Price
formPrice.description: Set the rental price per day for your product.

formSubmit.title: Step 10: Submit
formSubmit.description: Click Save to publish your product. It will be visible to all users on the platform.

browse.title: Step 1: Browse Products
browse.description: Click on a category here to browse all available products for rent.

selectProduct.title: Step 2: Product Catalog
selectProduct.description: Here you can see all available products. Browse through them to find what you need.

addToCart.title: Step 3: Select a Product
addToCart.description: Click on any product card to view its details, photos, price and availability. Choose rental dates and click 'Add to Cart'.

checkout.title: Step 4: Shopping Cart
checkout.description: After adding products to your cart, click here to view your cart and proceed to checkout.

confirm.title: Step 5: Complete Order
confirm.description: Fill in your shipping address, review the order, accept the terms and confirm. You'll receive a rental contract to sign in the Documents section.
